article_title: ATV riders still hoping for trail at Badger Ammo site
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Overcast. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 82F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph..

Tonight

Thunderstorms early, then cloudy skies after midnight. Low 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.author: MIKE IVEY | The Capital Times | mivey@madison.com

og.description: Public comments are running 3-1 against ATVs or a shooting range at the former Badger Army Ammunition Plant, but the issue is not settled.
